mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_FIELD ( F_FIELD_ID, F_OWNER_CLASS_ID, F_FIELD_NAME, F_TYPE, F_WIDTH, F_SCALE, F_CREF_CLASS_ID, F_EREF_ENUM_ID, F_FREF_FIELD_ID, F_PK, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F_NOTE ) VALUES ( #{ fieldId }, #{ ownerClassId }, #{ fieldName }, #{ type }, #{ width }, #{ scale }, #{ crefClassId }, #{ erefEnumId }, #{ frefFieldId }, #{ pk }, #{ title }, #{ description }, #{ note } )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_FIELD SET F_OWNER_CLASS_ID = #{ ownerClassId }, F_FIELD_NAME = #{ fieldName }, F_TYPE = #{ type }, F_WIDTH = #{ width }, F_SCALE = #{ scale }, F_CREF_CLASS_ID = #{ crefClassId }, F_EREF_ENUM_ID = #{ erefEnumId }, F_FREF_FIELD_ID = #{ frefFieldId }, F_PK = #{ pk }, F_TITLE = #{ title }, F_DESCRIPTION = #{ description }, F_NOTE = #{ note } WHERE F_FIELD_ID = #{ fieldId }
mapper.select: SELECT F_FIELD_ID AS "fieldId", F_OWNER_CLASS_ID AS "ownerClassId", F_FIELD_NAME AS "fieldName", F_TYPE AS "type", F_WIDTH AS "width", F_SCALE AS "scale", F_CREF_CLASS_ID AS "crefClassId", F_EREF_ENUM_ID AS "erefEnumId", F_FREF_FIELD_ID AS "frefFieldId", F_PK AS "pk", F_TITLE AS "title", F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", F_NOTE AS "note" FROM T_FIELD WHERE F_FIELD_ID = #{ fieldId }
